name: Laser Puppy Showdown
description:
You and up to three friends spawn on small playground where your objective is to collect 4 items - a food bowl, a fire hydrant, a dog collar, and a bone - in order to become the top dog. Once an item is collected, another will not be spawned until the holding player is defeated. Defeat players though melee attacks, powerups found around the playground, or by pushing them off the edge, but watch out - respawns are turned off while a player holds all four items. The player with all four items must successfully defeat all other players in order to win.

Controls (Xbox gamepad / Switch Joycon (sideways)):

Left Stick / Stick - Move

LT / SL - Run

A / A or down - Jump

X / B  or left - Bite

B / X or right - Powerup

Back - Restart

Start - Join

This game is a prototype made over about a month in small teams for the University of Utah's Entertainment Arts and Engineering Capstone program.
